plentry.pt: @param encryptionMode The encryption mode. @param encryptionMode The encryption mode.
plentry.pd: Encryption mode. The default encryption mode is `AES_128_XTS`. Encryption mode. The default encryption mode is `AES_128_XTS`. See . See .

pd.p: Encryption key in string type. Encryption key in string type.
pd.note: @note If you do not set an encryption key or set it as NULL, you cannot use the built-in encryption, and the SDK returns #ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT (-2). @note If you do not set an encryption key or set it as NULL, you cannot use the built-in encryption, and the SDK returns #ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT (-2).
